EmailTemplate.name: 201908_Global_Email_GoDirect_BGA_Email7ab_amr.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Another Flight Success
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, It’s almost 2020 and if you are not using an integrated flight planning with scheduling software, then you might be missing out! Honeywell Aerospace <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectflight_bga&utm_term=email7]]> is the first and only software provider of its kind, tailored to save Chief Pilots like you, time and money. So let’s get the process started. What time and date should I call you? Best regards,
Regina Warnke Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: (319) 573-9710 Email: regina.warnke@honeywell.com <[[mailto:regina.warnke@honeywell.com]]> GoDirectSales@honeywell.com <[[mailto:GoDirectSales@honeywell.com]]>
P.S. – If you are looking for more hands-on, dedicated support, our GoDirect Flight Sentinel <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect-flight-sentinel]]>, a concierge-style service, collaborates with ATC, monitors your aircraft’s position, and the progress of your flight while looking ahead for weather hazards, traffic congestion, ground delays, or any other conditions that may affect your flight.
